name: CORBA::omniORB
short_description: CORBA::omniORB is a Perl interface to the omniORB ORB. It was originally based on CORBA::MICO, and shares with it the feature of being completely dynamic, making it unnecessary to pregenerate "stubs" or "skeletons"
